description: React component implementing an AI chat widget with role-based suggestions and messaging functionality, including UI elements, state management, and API interactions.

methods.name: getRoleFromPath
methods.description: Determines user role based on URL pathname.

methods.name: getRoleDisplayName
methods.description: Returns display name for a given user role.

methods.name: getRoleHelpTopics
methods.description: Provides role-specific help topics for the chat widget.

methods.name: AIChatWidget
methods.description: Main React component for the AI chat widget, managing UI, state, and interactions.
